blueprint.description: Installs GitDock (a GitLab User Interface) on nearly any system
blueprint.overview: [GitDock](https://gitlab.com/mvanremmerden/gitdock) is an app that displays all your GitLab activities in one place. Instead of the GitLab typical project- or group-centric approach, it collects all your information from a user-centric perspective.
blueprint.name: GitDock
blueprint.title: GitDock
